text: William Barner Lienhard (January 14, 1930 â€“ February 8, 2022) was an American basketball player. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics, winning a gold medal. Lienhard was born in Slaton, Texas. Lienhard died on February 8, 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:American basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:People from Lubbock, Texas
